channel.title: Moparscape mobile device
channel.description:
Hello all,
I just wanted to say something about the mobile theme of moparscape. I think it need some changes.
First of all : a home button that redirects to the index page.
Second : making an quote button for posts. Because if i missclick or try to see a link or picture in a post i am auto quoting. Which can be usefull but verry frustrating.
I tried to use the classic but for some reason it keeps changing to this.

item.title: Moparscape mobile device
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Hello all,

I just wanted to say something about the mobile theme of moparscape.
I think it need some changes.

First of all : a home button that redirects to the index page.

Second : making an quote button for posts.
Because if i missclick or try to see a link or picture in a post i am auto quoting. Which can be usefull but verry frustrating.

I tried to use the classic but for some reason it keeps changing to this.

Read full topic
